edu.rmit.eres.seaports.controller

Class AdminControllerTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.rmit.eres.seaports.controller.AdminControllerTest

  • @ContextConfiguration(value="/test-context.xml")
@Transactional
public class AdminControllerTest
extends java.lang.Object
    This test class holds the unit tests regarding the administration pages and actions
    Author:
    Guillaume Prevost

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void prepareData()
      Method executed before starting the unit tests to prepared the data
      void userEnableDisableAdministratorTest()
      userEnableDisable should fail because the user to disable is an administrator: an error message is set and a listing of the users is retrieved
      void userEnableDisableNoAdminRightsTest()
      The user doesn't have administrator rights: an access denied exception should be thrown
      void userEnableDisableTest()
      userEnableDisable should suceed: the user is first disabled, then enable again
      void userEnableDisableUnknownUserTest()
      userEnableDisable should fail because the user is unknown: an error message is set and a listing of the users is retrieved
      void userListNoAdminRightsTest()
      The user doesn't have administrator rights: an access denied exception should be thrown
      void userListTest()
      userList should succeed: a list of users should be retrieved
